nml_option.name: config_AM_conservationCheck_enable
nml_option.description: If true, ocean analysis member conservationCheck is called.

nml_option.name: config_AM_conservationCheck_compute_interval
nml_option.description: Timestamp determining how often analysis member computation should be performed.

nml_option.name: config_AM_conservationCheck_output_stream
nml_option.description: Name of the stream that the conservationCheck analysis member should be tied to.

nml_option.name: config_AM_conservationCheck_compute_on_startup
nml_option.description: Logical flag determining if an analysis member computation occurs on start-up.

nml_option.name: config_AM_conservationCheck_write_on_startup
nml_option.description: Logical flag determining if an analysis member write occurs on start-up.

nml_option.name: config_AM_conservationCheck_write_to_logfile
nml_option.description: Logical flag determining if the conservation check is written to the log file.

nml_option.name: config_AM_conservationCheck_restart_stream
nml_option.description: Name of the restart stream the analysis member will use to initialize itself if restart is enabled.
nml_option.possible_values: A restart stream with state of the conservation check.

nml_option.name: config_AM_conservationCheck_carbon_failure_abort
nml_option.description: If true, abort if carbon conservation fails bounds check.

package.name: conservationCheckAMPKG
package.description: This package includes variables required for the conservationCheck analysis member.

var.name: performConservationPrecompute
var.description: Perform the conservation precompute

var.name: nAccumulate
var.description: Number of time-steps accumulated

var.name: cellInHemisphere
var.description: Hemisphere flag

var.name: earthArea
var.description: area of the whole earth

var.name: domainArea
var.description: accumulated domain area

var.name: accumulatedSeaIceArea
var.description: accumulated sea ice area

var.name: initialEnergy
var.description: Total initial energy of ice and snow

var.name: finalEnergy
var.description: Total final energy of ice and snow

var.name: energyChange
var.description: Total energy change of ice and snow during time step

var.name: energyChangeFlux
var.description: Total energy change flux of ice and snow during time step

var.name: netEnergyFlux
var.description: Net energy flux to ice

var.name: absoluteEnergyError
var.description: Absolute energy conservation error

var.name: relativeEnergyError
var.description: Relative energy conservation error

var.name: initialMass
var.description: Total initial mass of ice and snow

var.name: finalMass
var.description: Total final mass of ice and snow

var.name: massChange
var.description: Total mass change of ice and snow during time step

var.name: massChangeFlux
var.description: Total mass change flux of ice and snow during time step

var.name: netMassFlux
var.description: Net mass flux to ice

var.name: absoluteMassError
var.description: Absolute mass conservation error

var.name: relativeMassError
var.description: Relative mass conservation error

var.name: initialSalt
var.description: Total initial salt of ice and snow

var.name: finalSalt
var.description: Total final salt of ice and snow

var.name: saltChange
var.description: Total salt change of ice and snow during time step

var.name: saltChangeFlux
var.description: Total salt change flux of ice and snow during time step

var.name: netSaltFlux
var.description: Net salt flux to ice

var.name: absoluteSaltError
var.description: Absolute salt conservation error

var.name: relativeSaltError
var.description: Relative salt conservation error

var.name: relativeErrorBounds
var.description: accumulated relative error bounds

var.name: initialCarbon
var.description: Total initial carbon of ice and snow

var.name: finalCarbon
var.description: Total final carbon of ice and snow

var.name: carbonChange
var.description: Total carbon change of ice and snow during time step

var.name: carbonChangeFlux
var.description: Total carbon change flux of ice and snow during time step

var.name: netCarbonFlux
var.description: Net carbon flux to sea ice

var.name: absoluteCarbonError
var.description: Absolute carbon conservation error

var.name: relativeCarbonError
var.description: Relative carbon conservation error

var.name: accumAbsoluteCarbonError
var.description: Accumulated since start absolute carbon conservation error

var.name: accumRelativeCarbonError
var.description: Accumulated since start relative carbon conservation error

var.name: carbonConsOceanCarbonFlux
var.description: Total ocean carbon flux, positive into the ocean

var.name: carbonConsOceanCarbonFluxCheck
var.description: Total ocean carbon flux computed from individual passed fluxes, positive into the ocean

var.name: carbonConsDiatomFlux
var.description: Total algal diatom carbon flux, positive into the ocean

var.name: carbonConsSmallAlgaeFlux
var.description: Total small algae carbon flux, positive into the ocean

var.name: carbonConsDOC1Flux
var.description: Total dissolved organic carbon (polysaccharids) carbon flux, positive into the ocean

var.name: carbonConsDOC2Flux
var.description: Total dissolved organic carbon (lipids) carbon flux, positive into the ocean

var.name: carbonConsDONCarbonFlux
var.description: Total dissolved organic carbon (proteins) flux, positive into the ocean

var.name: carbonConsDICFlux
var.description: Total dissolved inorganic carbon flux, positive into the ocean

var.name: carbonConsHumicsFlux
var.description: Total dissolved humics carbon flux, positive into the ocean

var.name: carbonConsSemiLabileDOCFlux
var.description: Total semi-labile DOC flux, positive into the ocean
